fusion-oracle.cpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /* fusion-oracle.cpp: oracle selection; if the correct prediction
00002    exists among *any* of the component predictors, then this
00003    meta-predictor will select the correct one.  This is extremely
00004    optimistic as the only time this will mispredict is when *all*
00005    component predictions are wrong.  Obviously using a static
00006    taken predictor and static NT predictor with the fusion_oracle
00007    will result in perfect direction prediction. */
00008 /*
00009  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00010  */
00011 
00012 #define COMPONENT_NAME "oracle"
00013 
00014 #ifdef BPRED_PARSE_ARGS
00015 if(!strcasecmp("oracle",type) || !strcmp("perfect",type))
00016 {
00017   return new fusion_oracle_t(num_pred);
00018 }
00019 #else
00020 
00021 class fusion_oracle_t:public fusion_t
00022 {
00023   public:
00024 
00025   /* CREATE */
00026   fusion_oracle_t(const int arg_num_pred)
00027   {
00028     init();
00029 
00030     name = strdup(COMPONENT_NAME);
00031     if(!name)
00032       fatal("couldn't malloc fusion oracle name (strdup)");
00033 
00034     type = strdup("oracle");
00035     if(!type)
00036       fatal("couldn't malloc fusion oracle type (strdup)");
00037 
00038     num_pred = arg_num_pred;
00039 
00040     bits = 0;
00041   }
00042 
00043   /* LOOKUP */
00044   FUSION_LOOKUP_HEADER
00045   {
00046     bool pred = !outcome;
00047 
00048     for(int i=0;i<num_pred;i++)
00049     {
00050       if(preds[i]==outcome)
00051       {
00052         pred = outcome;
00053         break;
00054       }
00055     }
00056 
00057     BPRED_STAT(lookups++;)
00058     scvp->updated = false;
00059 
00060     return pred;
00061   }
00062 
00063   /* UPDATE */
00064 
00065   /* generic n-component version */
00066   FUSION_UPDATE_HEADER
00067   {
00068     if(!scvp->updated)
00069     {
00070       BPRED_STAT(updates++;)
00071       BPRED_STAT(num_hits += our_pred == outcome;)
00072       scvp->updated = true;
00073     }
00074   }
00075 
00076 };
00077 
00078 #endif /* BPRED_PARSE_ARGS */
00079 #undef COMPONENT_NAME
